topic.title: Upgrading to Greenplum 6
topic.shortdesc: This topic identifies the upgrade and migration paths supported for the Greenplum Database 6.x. release.

body.p: Greenplum Database 6 supports upgrading from a Greenplum 6.x release to a newer Greenplum 6.x release. Direct upgrade from Greenplum Database 4.3 or 5 to Greenplum 6 is not supported; you must migrate the data to Greenplum 6.
